DOC.brief_summary: The six-minute walk test use assessment cardiopulmonary parameter patient lung heart disease . And good reliability validity . It use extensively research aerobic capacity patient peripheral vascular disease , neural system disease , even muscular-skeletal system disease , osteoarthritis , total hip knee arthroplasty . There study investigate predictor base cardiopulmonary factor , neuromuscular skeletal factor six-minute walk distance . But last neuromuscular skeletal factor . The purpose study investigate correlation six-minute walk distance neuromuscular parameter : muscle function ( include muscle endurance , muscle strength muscle power ) , knee proprioception , stand balance . For could useful evaluation treatment patient clinic . The study plan select 100 subject , old 65 year old independent walking without diagnosis symptom cardiopulmonary neural disease . The evaluation include knee proprioception ( closed chain , active-active test ) , six-minute walk test , one leg stand balance test ( open close eye 30 second ) , quadriceps muscle strength velocity 600/s,1200/s 1800/s , quadriceps muscle power 1800/s , quadriceps muscle endurance . To investigate correlation six-minute walk distance characteristic subject , correlation six-minute walk distance neuromuscular parameter , include quadriceps muscle function ( strength , endurance power ) , knee proprioception , one leg stand balance . And analyze â€™ contribution six-minute walk distance .
DOC.brief_title: Correlation 6-Minute Walk Test Neuromuscular Parameters Elderly
